name: Construct 2 Tech Demo: Baldi's Basics - You Can Think Pad
name_original: Construct 2 Tech Demo: Baldi's Basics - You Can Think Pad
description:
This is a tech demo to demonstrate the power of Construct 2. Not much can be done after you answer the 3 questions, as this is just a tech demo, so...

Description:

This is a SIMULATION of the YCTP from Baldi's Basics Classic. This also has Android support... I guess but anyway, this goes to show how the sky is the limit when you are making a Construct 2 game.

NOTE: SUBSEQUENT UPDATES MAY INCLUDE BUG FIXES OR NEW FEATURES AND GAMEPLAY ELEMENTS.
